metadata.title: USN-6544-1 -- GNU binutils vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that GNU binutils incorrectly handled certain COFF files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a crash or execute arbitrary code. This issue only affected Ubuntu 14.04 LTS. (CVE-2022-38533)  It was discovered that GNU binutils was not properly performing bounds checks in several functions, which could lead to a buffer overflow. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service, expose sensitive information or execute arbitrary code. This issue only affected Ubuntu 20.04 LTS and Ubuntu 22.04 LTS.  (CVE-2022-4285, CVE-2020-19726, CVE-2021-46174)  It was discovered that GNU binutils contained a reachable assertion, which could lead to an intentional assertion failure when processing certain crafted DWARF files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service. This issue only affected Ubuntu 20.04 LTS  and Ubuntu 22.04 LTS. (CVE-2022-35205)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6544-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  binutils-dev - 2.38-4ubuntu2.4 binutils-arm-linux-gnueabihf - 2.38-4ubuntu2.4 binutils-hppa64-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.4 binutils-ia64-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.4 binutils-multiarch - 2.38-4ubuntu2.4 binutils-x86-64-kfreebsd-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.4 binutils-riscv64-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.4 binutils-m68k-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.4 binutils-for-build - 2.38-4ubuntu2.4 binutils-s390x-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.4 binutils-x86-64-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.4 binutils-multiarch-dev - 2.38-4ubuntu2.4 binutils-i686-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.4 libctf-nobfd0 - 2.38-4ubuntu2.4 binutils-for-host - 2.38-4ubuntu2.4 binutils-doc - 2.38-4ubuntu2.4 binutils-sh4-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.4 binutils-aarch64-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.4 libctf0 - 2.38-4ubuntu2.4 binutils-source - 2.38-4ubuntu2.4 binutils-i686-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.4 binutils-common - 2.38-4ubuntu2.4 binutils-x86-64-linux-gnux32 - 2.38-4ubuntu2.4 binutils-i686-kfreebsd-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.4 binutils-powerpc64le-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.4 binutils-powerpc64-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.4 binutils-hppa-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.4 binutils-sparc64-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.4 libbinutils - 2.38-4ubuntu2.4 binutils-arm-linux-gnueabi - 2.38-4ubuntu2.4 binutils-alpha-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.4 binutils-powerpc-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.4 binutils - 2.38-4ubuntu2.4 No subscription required
